name: Madness Beckons
description:
Madness Beckons is a story about a man who journeys out to an abandoned island asylum, called Faith Beckons, to investigate a case regarding some mysterious disappearances and occult sightings. But once there, he finds more than he bargained for... For within these walls, madness lies.. And it is beckoning him inside.

Madness Beckons was supposed to be a grandeose eldritch horror game where you walked through the Sunken City of R'lyeh, domain of Cthulhu, but due to time restraints I had to turn that down to an insane asylum. The game may feel a bit rushed, but I hope you will enjoy playing it all the same.

Credit for relevant assets is given in game.

Update: Due to some mentioned errors, I have uploaded the newest version at our company website: http://unuslupus.com/files/brackeysgamejam2021/Madness%20Beckons%20(Windows).zip

For reviews it is still recommended you download the itch.io version for the initially submitted version.
